channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Court Cam
channel.desc: An in-depth examination of some of the most stunning and emotional courtroom moments caught on camera. Dan Abrams observes on the surveillance camera to catch a glimpse of a series of events in the courtroom. The show also describes the suspects' criminal charge and sentencing, depending whether the defendant is either innocent or guilty. Each episode includes interviews with judges, witnesses, and victims who give a first-hand account of what really happened during these intense courtroom moments.
